Transcription for 547606

To come his altar call,
And so the strength of Jesse's rod,
And crown him, crown him, crown him,
Crown him, crown him, crown him,
Crown him, crown him, crown him,
Lord of all.
And in the willow, where thy fire,
A green grassland green,
And in the red, thy will,
Come, come, thy frist,
Rosary of him,
I can, I can, I can,
Come, come, I can,
I can, I can, I can,
Heal him.
O hail the power of Jesus' name,
Let angels cross and fall,
In throes the royal joy of death,
And crown him, crown him, crown him,
Crown him!
